title: Kubernetes for GenAI: Why It Makes So Much Sense
author: Ryan Wallner
description: Kubernetes support for third-party operators, storage integrations, GPU enablement and more make it a great platform for GenAI applications.
cntitle: Kubernetes 用于生成式 AI：为什么它如此合理
